title: You Deserve a Lover
occurrences: "For my Lila, my little Frida, you deserve a lover."
I put "you deserve a lover" because
"You deserve a lover who gets you up in the morning
"You deserve a lover who makes you feel safe,
"You deserve a lover who wants to dance with you,
"You deserve a lover who listens when you sing,
"You deserve a lover who takes away the lies
regex: \b((?!\bYou\ Deserve\ a\ Lover:)You\ Deserve\ a\ Lover)(?!\:)(?!'t)\b
